it.unibo.alchemist.boundary.wormhole.implementation

Class LinZoomManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unibo.alchemist.boundary.wormhole.implementation.AbstractSlideInputManager
      • it.unibo.alchemist.boundary.wormhole.implementation.LinZoomManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISlideInputManager, IZoomManager

    public class LinZoomManager
extends AbstractSlideInputManager
implements IZoomManager
    An LinZoomManager converts the sliding of any physical/virtual device/control into a zoom rate through a linear function.
    Zoom = amount of slides * rate.
